name: the √Evil
description:
Money – the root of all evil. You have it, you love it, you’ve earned it.

And what a useful resource your workers have been: give them just enough to get by and they give you enough to get very, very rich.

For whatever reason the God of Justice doesn’t like it though and Their wrath is now upon you. Your objective is to run away from Them by sacrificing workers. However, sacrifices don't come for free. Try to escape, while saving as much of your wealth as possible.

There is math and luck involved.

 

Some may think you are evil, but what do the poor know anyway?
